channel.title: Adding Shops Problem

item.title: Adding Shops Problem
item.dc:creator: @Nexus1 Nexus_
item.description:
@Nexus1 wrote:

If (NPCID == 2538) { If(q11 !=15) { PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 4; }

Take out

 If(q11 !=15) {

That statement means you need quest 11 completed. So you cant access that shop without having that quest completed. Im supposing this is Project Annihilation base?..

Read full topic

item.title: Adding Shops Problem
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

make this:
If (NPCID == 2538) {
If(q11 !=15) {
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 4;
}
Into:
If (NPCID == 2538) {
//Put desc. here
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 4;
}
Now i bet theres an extra } under the one thats below wanneShop = 4; remove it, otherwise you get 100 errors

item.title: Adding Shops Problem

@Wilddar wrote:

There is non in that format but there’s more WanneShop:

If (NPCID == 2538) {
If(q11 !=15) {
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 4;
}

That’s one which is involved with my 4th shop.

item.title: Adding Shops Problem
item.dc:creator: @Wilddar Wilddar
item.description:
@Wilddar wrote:

Ok so I’m having a problem with my shops I added.

First thing I did was add the NPC’s which was successful

Second I added the shops in client.java. So I types control F, and I search: WanneShop =

Then what I did was add the shops. Here is 2 of my first shops I added:

} if (NPCID == 520) {
// General Store Owner
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 1; // General Store Shop

} if (NPCID == 534) {
// Fairy Shop Owner
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 2; // Fairy Store Shop

Etc…

So I added that.

Third, I added the shops to my shops.cfg.

shop = 1 General Store 113 1000…etc
shop = 2 Fairy Store Shop 4151 500…etc

So I did all that and…

The compile was successful without errors, and also the run.bat ran without errors.

But then I log in, and only my General Shop will work, non of my other 7 shops work.

All help is appreciated.

Thanks!

Read full topic
